definition: Drawing out the full nature of the user's problem through targeted questions

positive_examples: Could you share the error message you're seeing?
What have you tried so far?
When does this problem occur - every time, or only in certain situations?
Can you walk me through what happens when you try to run it?
Is this happening consistently, or intermittently? And does it affect all users or just certain accounts?
training_hints.disambiguation: Skillful questioning to understand the problem, not just requesting more input
